summary: BuildRequest lists no explicit requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff modifies backend/main.mo to add/expand social-network features (profiles with avatar/cover/bio plus friend requests, posts, authorization/storage mixins) and updates project_state.json to enumerate multiple features/REQ IDs that are not present in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Friend request system (send/track incoming/outgoing requests, friendships map, related types like FriendRequest).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (BuildRequest has no requirements; title focuses only on customizable profile fields).

hallucinated_features.description: Posts/timeline/feed-related data structures and logic (Post type, postsMap, timestamp sorting helper).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (BuildRequest contains no requirements; non-goals focus on not adding extra profile fields and not adding 3rd-party auth).

hallucinated_features.description: Authorization enforcement using AccessControl/MixinAuthorization and permission checks (#user) around profile access.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest (no requirements mention authorization changes).

hallucinated_features.description: Blob storage integration via Storage/MixinStorage and profile media fields using Storage.ExternalBlob.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested (BuildRequest does not specify storage mechanism; only mentions avatar/cover/bio at a high level).

hallucinated_features.description: Project state update enumerating multiple features with REQ-1..REQ-9 (Internet Identity sign-in, profile editing, directory/search, friend workflow, timeline, home feed, visual theme, placeholder assets, header branding).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states Requirements: none; adding many REQ-linked features in project_state.json is not grounded in the request.
